"oh no a card without an id. instance id: " + ToString(Object.Behavior::InstanceId())

events.inlineCode:
const [deck] = objects
deck.cardInstanceIds = []

const [deck] = objects
deck.cardInstanceIds = global.Babblebot.Lodash.shuffle(deck.cardInstanceIds)

const [deck] = objects
eventsFunctionContext.returnValue = deck.cardInstanceIds.length

const [deck] = objects
eventsFunctionContext.returnValue = (deck.cardInstanceIds.length === 0)

const [hand] = objects
hand.cardInstanceIds = []

parameters: "Drawing card - size went from " + ToString(Object.Variable(OriginalSize)) + " to " + ToString(Object.Behavior::Size())
"Playing card - size went from " + ToString(Object.Variable(OriginalSize)) + " to " + ToString(Object.Behavior::Size())
